name: Zeff
text: DON!! x1 When this Character deals damage to your opponent's life, you may trash 7 cards from the top of your deck. On Play Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand, then you may trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

effect.text: When this Character deals damage to your opponent's life, you may trash 7 cards from the top of your deck.
Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand, then you may trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the 'SAMPLE' watermark.
